ragon bow was an enchanted longbow rumored to be imbued with the spirits of Chultan dragons.
Dragon bows were created to honor the great dragons who once lived in Chult. When used in combat, every shot made with a dragon bow was empowered by dragon spirits, making it a powerful enchanted item. Additionally, these bows enhanced the users individual powers and abilities.
*Artus Cimber one of the undying barae of Mezro in the late 15 century DR.
